CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Search relevance improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Improvements to relevancy of search results in Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and personalized results based on interests.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Search relevance improvements
OldVersion.description: Improvements to relevancy of search results in Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and personalized results based on interests.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Workspace Links
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly request access to a workspace by clicking on a Workspace Link.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Loop: Workspace Links
OldVersion.description: Quickly request access to a workspace by clicking on a Workspace Link.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
CurrentVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
OldVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
CurrentVersion.description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
OldVersion.description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - In-app search relevance improvement to increase matching results
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning in-app Search will be improved to show more relevant and matching results at the top.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - In-app search relevance improvement to increase matching results
OldVersion.description: Viva Learning in-app Search will be improved to show more relevant and matching results at the top.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint. The status has been adjusted to correctly reflect the current status of this feature. We apologize for any confusion.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
OldVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint. The status has been adjusted to correctly reflect the current status of this feature. We apologize for any confusion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Baseline with Project level variance
CurrentVersion.description: Record a snapshot of the project and view project level variance to know if the project is on track or delayed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Baseline with Project level variance
OldVersion.description: Record a snapshot of the project and view project level variance to know if the project is on track or delayed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
CurrentVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
OldVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: new Teams is now part of Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The new Teams app is now supported on Teams Rooms on Windows, allowing all Teams Rooms devices to optimize room experience and render intelligent audio and video more reliably.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: new Teams is now part of Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: The new Teams app is now supported on Teams Rooms on Windows, allowing all Teams Rooms devices to optimize room experience and render intelligent audio and video more reliably.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated teams and channels onboarding flow
CurrentVersion.description: When added to a new team, users can see which channels the team owner recommended, and select to show only the channels that are relevant to them.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated teams and channels onboarding flow
OldVersion.description: When added to a new team, users can see which channels the team owner recommended, and select to show only the channels that are relevant to them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Customization and preview of email notifications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification is getting advanced customization options: 1. Extensive Token Support which provides precise details to end users using the expanded token library. 2. DLP Exchange rule matched email attachment control to choose to include/exclude matched email as an attachment in end-user notifications. 3. Tailored Email Content to customize the sender display name and email body using HTML, markdown, or plain text. 4. Ability to preview the email notification to ensure it meets your requirements.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Customization and preview of email notifications
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification is getting advanced customization options: 1. Extensive Token Support which provides precise details to end users using the expanded token library. 2. DLP Exchange rule matched email attachment control to choose to include/exclude matched email as an attachment in end-user notifications. 3. Tailored Email Content to customize the sender display name and email body using HTML, markdown, or plain text. 4. Ability to preview the email notification to ensure it meets your requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Analytics and Recommendations to understand risks, improve existing policies and improve posture
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards:  for DLP with 2 Cards that show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Analytics and Recommendations to understand risks, improve existing policies and improve posture
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards:  for DLP with 2 Cards that show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Share to Teams will be added to the ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to find a "Share to Teams" button in the ribbon whenever they select an email in the reading pane. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Share to Teams will be added to the ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Users will now be able to find a "Share to Teams" button in the ribbon whenever they select an email in the reading pane. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
CurrentVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
OldVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Sensitive information processing model
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users will now have the capability to apply a prebuilt sensitive information processing model to SharePoint libraries. This model is designed to detect and possibly extract sensitive information from documents upon their library.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Sensitive information processing model
OldVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users will now have the capability to apply a prebuilt sensitive information processing model to SharePoint libraries. This model is designed to detect and possibly extract sensitive information from documents upon their library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
OldVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Contact View and Org Chart
CurrentVersion.description: ,This improves the large contact view experience, including the org chart and recent files.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Contact View and Org Chart
OldVersion.description: ,This improves the large contact view experience, including the org chart and recent files.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Copilot in Microsoft Teams chat and channels to summarize content over a specified period of time
CurrentVersion.description: You can now ask Copilot in chat and channels to respond to questions regarding a conversation in a specific time period, for example: last month.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Copilot in Microsoft Teams chat and channels to summarize content over a specified period of time
OldVersion.description: You can now ask Copilot in chat and channels to respond to questions regarding a conversation in a specific time period, for example: last month.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Save filters for Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: This adds the ability to save the filters applied to Activity Explorer and use them later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
CurrentVersion.description: ,This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Brand kit - Extended elements and tenant-wide rollout
CurrentVersion.description: Brand kit enables anyone to create and share brand asset collections including colors, fonts, and logos to easily apply brand elements while creating. This release adds support for images, backgrounds, stickers, video, and audio asset types. An organization's official assets can now be rolled out tenant-wide via SharePoint Organization Asset Libraries (OAL). Brand kit creation, sharing, and manual usage is being made generally available to all Clipchamp for work accounts for users with standard access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Webinar presenter orderability on event page
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now customize the list of presenters in the webinar event page via drag and drop functionality. This option can be found under the "Presenter Bio" section of the webinar set-up dialog box.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup Storage
CurrentVersion.description: ,The new Microsoft 365 Backup Storage API enables developers to build customized versions of their applications that are integrated with the Microsoft 365 Backup Storage platform. This helps to ensure exceptionally fast recovery from typical business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) scenarios, such as ransomware attacks, accidental/malicious deletion, or overwriting of content by employees.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 backup storage
OldVersion.description: ,The new Microsoft 365 Backup Storage API enables developers to build customized versions of their applications that are integrated with the Microsoft 365 Backup Storage platform. This helps to ensure exceptionally fast recovery from typical business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) scenarios, such as ransomware attacks, accidental/malicious deletion, or overwriting of content by employees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Turn On/Off notifications for a post
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to opt in/opt-out from receiving notifications for a post in a channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Show/hide discover feed
CurrentVersion.description: You will now have the flexibility to show or hide (turn off/turn on) discover feed. Users can access this new toggle from the general settings section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Adaptive Scopes operator support
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview adaptive scopes will be enhanced to include query support for "contains" and "not contains". For more information on adaptive scopes, see the link below.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/purview/purview-adaptive-scopes
